member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceExtensions.AddOrchardCms(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds Orchard CMS services to the application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceExtensions.AddOrchardCms(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.OrchardCoreBuilder})
member.summary: Adds Orchard CMS services to the application and let the app change the default tenant behavior and set of features through a configure action.
